projects.title: CodeEngima
projects.description: It is a web application which was used for hosting the Code Enigma Season 3 (2018), a coding competition which is being held in LNCT Bhopal annually for the last three years (2016-18).

projects.title: Wild Tiger Restaurant
projects.description: My design for the Grip Project #2 (Rebuild a Restaurant Website). Grip stands for Grind Reel Incentive Project, it's basically a community project/contest in which the members of the Grind Reel (Discord Server) participate to flourish the portfolios and practice their skills.

projects.title: Game of Life
projects.description: My implementation of John Horton Convoy's Game of Life (Cellular Automaton) with React.js

projects.title: Unofficial-CodersClub-SearchTool
projects.description: This is a project which I create for my college juniors, so that they can learn how to send a Pull Request.

projects.title: CPPSUDUKO
projects.description: CPP SUDUKO is a console based Suduko Game created in C++.
